messages.subject: Off list for a bit
messages.msgSnippet: Thought I d post this as I ve gotten a few emails asking about the allergy stuff. I ll be barely on email for the next few weeks, and probably deleting 90% of
messages.messageBody:
Thought I'd post this as I've gotten a few emails asking about the allergy
stuff. I'll be barely on email for the next few weeks, and probably deleting
90% of digests, so if there's something you want me to see, please send it
to me personally and don't feel offended if I don't respond for a few days,
I'll be popping in and out of town for the next few weeks.
I'm off today to go to my mom's house and throw her a fabulous 60th birthday
party (with a 50's "Rock around the clock" theme). Should be lots of work
and fun (hopefully). Then I'll be back for a few days, will probably hardly
get caught up with mail and I'll be off North for my DH's grandpa's 90th
birthday celebration. After a few days of visiting, I'll be back for a
couple of weeks, then off to the Portland area to do my first triathlon
since 1998. I'm hoping to find some time between now and then to train for
this, LOL :-)

I'll most likely be back full-time in mid-June. Until then, I hope everyone
has a wonderful few weeks of spring!

Blue Skies!
-Robin-
Mom to Mackenzie (8/28/96) inventer of new and wonderful things
and Asa (10/5/99) singer of protest songs
http://www.geocities.com/the_clevengers Flying Clevenger Family
